kit.leader_skill: "Battle of Fate" or "Majin Buu Saga" Category Ki +3, HP & ATK +170% and DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Elimination Burst
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage; A medium chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Eternal Cataclysm
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 180% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance of becoming a Super Attack; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up (up to 120%); After receiving an attack: Recovers 20% HP at the end of turn; When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack: Great chance of nullifying it

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance of becoming a Super Attack
Recovers 20% HP at the end of turn

lines.context: When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack

active_skill.name: Evil War Cry
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there is a "Majin Buu Saga" Category enemy Or after the character receives an attack 6 or more times in battle (once only)

passive_skill.name: Eternal Cataclysm
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 20% up; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 160%); Per "Majin Power" or "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally on the team (depending on which Category has more members): ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 120%); Damage reduction rate 10% up (up to 30%); Before receiving 6 attack(s) in battle: DEF 100% up; Damage reduction rate 20% up; After receiving an attack: Recovers 20% HP at the end of turn; For 3 turn(s) from the character's entry turn: Nullifies Unarmed Super Attacks directed at the character; Starting from the 4th turn from the character's entry turn: Great chance of nullifying Unarmed Super Attacks directed at the character

High chance of performing a critical hit

lines.context: Per "Majin Power" or "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally on the team (depending on which Category has more members)

lines.text: Recovers 20% HP at the end of turn
